title: MetaStreet DAO NFT Collateral Value
body:
This is a NEGATIVE CONSENT vote - if a quorum of greater than 20% is reached, the proposal will be deemed to be denied by the DAO. If no quorum is reached, the proposal will be deemed to be accepted by the DAO.

Proposal: MetaStreet DAO will define an NFT's collateral value (the "Collateral Value") as the volume weighted average daily transacted floor price over the trailing 30 days. Collateral Value will exclude transactions that are less than 15% of the first quartile of a given day's transactions. Collateral Value will be updated every 7 days.
author: 0x2735e0561C1A1A4a75515bE1902E8Fa530eB6a36
